website_summaries.verdict: A simple, portable option, this fog machine is the perfect addition to any party or get-together.
pros: Releases an appropriate  stream for homes and small spaces
A compact model that is easy to store when not in use
Visible fluid level makes machine easy to use
cons: The machine tends to be noisy relative to its small size
Need to buy your own fog fluid

customer_reviews.title: Very good service
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. I initially gave 1 star to the product because it stopped working after two uses. I thought that nobody would bother to help me with such an inexpensive product. Well, I was wrong. The seller of the fog machine contacted me via email right after I posted my review and offered to replace it without requiring me to send the old machine back. I just received the replacement, one a Sunday, two days after they shipped it, and it works perfectly. Needless to say, I'm very impressed by the level of service provided and I'm a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Kidney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a photo shoot and it was super easy to use and worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Matthews

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! It literally paid for itself w/ the first time use! I mainly use it for when friends come over, you know, to give them a proper welcome. Along w/ some hype music & a simple lightshow, (consisting of a flashlight) the fog machine plays an essential part of providing my guests w/ the Grand Entrance of which they fully deserve! Wish I'd gotten this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of fog!
customer_reviews.text: I set this up for a birthday party and it was perfect. The machine worked very well, and we got a great steady stream of fog. I used my own liquid as others had pointed out, and it worked out really well. Well made and at this price point its excellent for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Frylock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I wouldn't use it in your home unless you want to set off the smoke alarms. It produces a lot of smoke in the minute that it works for. Then the unit has to heat up again and you are ready to fog again. IF you are going to use it indoors then you need to push the button for a second of fog/smoke, any more and you'll create a problem indoors for your smoke alarms. Using it outside on a still day, I had people stop by and ask if the house was on fire. Great fog/smoke output. I seem to be the hit of the street this year! Great machine and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized for home use -- a little powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact fog machine that I wish I had purchased many Halloweens ago. Most of the bigger machines are overkill for in-home use, so this is a refreshingly home-appropriate model. If you buy, make sure to run it until it's empty and make an effort to keep it clean. All fog machines will clog (it's the juice that goes inside) if not properly maintained.
customer_reviews.author: SuitedPair

customer_reviews.title: JUNK.  Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: JUNK! Used it once for about 5 minutes and it produced great fog. Then, never worked again - the red light just stays on and pressing the button yields nothing. Tried contacting their support twice via website and all I got was crickets. Look elsewhere for fog machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Charles

customer_reviews.title: Come and get your fog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an intro hazer for film shoots and it’s dope. We filled a small gymnasium space in no time on an Under Armour spot and it was awesome. Totally dope footage. The only thing I’d like is if it had an automatic blast timer- currently as far as I can tell you have to continue to push the button to fire it, which requires manual operation, but hey, for the cost it’s incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use at work where I was having a hard time finding an air leak in an enclosure. Worked like a charm. Dirt cheap for all the time it saved me. There is a tip for use though. Plug it in and let it warm up before you need it. It won’t make fog until the red LED on the controller lights. Also it makes a noise while pumping fog. Sounds a bit like an aquarium pump, but a little louder. This was fine for my application but might break the mood at a spooky Halloween thing. In other uses just turn up the music and it won’t bother the dancers.
customer_reviews.author: BKerr

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, great fog output.  Wired remote has one big advantage over wireless
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase a fog machine for Halloween this year and this one does the trick. The only drawback I encountered is that you have to press the button each time it cools down and is ready to produce more fog. This is common for fog machines in this price range but to work around this you can tape the button down on the remote to allow it to fire off bursts automatically each time after it cools down. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow Knows

customer_reviews.title: The fog machine that’s built like a tank but priced like a Kia
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fog machine for a photo shoot and holy cow! This thing means business and takes a beating. I knocked it over and knocked it down and tipped it over (I was shooting in the dark) and the darn thing kept on cranking out fog like it was it’s job. I attached a photo because fog just makes everything cooler. My wife suggested we hook it up in our apartment and just have fog be part of our daily lives. I couldn’t agree more. #foglife
customer_reviews.author: cmpfuel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with this fog machine
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this fog machine. Produces much more than I was expecting. Use this in a 22*30 room which is quite large and it fills the entire room up quite quickly. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for low budget film effects
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this fog machine. I use it creating light shafts and it works great, especially for its price. It's definitely not perfect, like a hazer, but for the price. I can't complain. The size of it makes it easy to hide too, especially if you need to squeeze it into a corner. It's great for low budget filmmaking. Again, it won't be perfect, but if you're in a pinch and have no money, this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: klee

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of fog
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for Halloween! The fog passed by a fog chiller and the smoke stayed low
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Way worth it, great value. I want more units.
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaayy worth the 38 bucks or whatever I spent. Looked at all the others that cost double or four times the cost. This does it all. Manually blast the fog with the remote. Or use the key fob controller wirelessly and it will auto cycle ever 45 seconds or whatever. I used froggys fog juice and it’s killer. Run this fog through some ice and it settles like in the moviesfx!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Worked good after I fixed the big water leakage it has, came defective
customer_reviews.text: I installed this fog machine, added fog liquid and followed the instructions, then it was blowing fog but it was leaking water everywhere on my counter from the back, front and grill inside the unit a big mess. So I decided to take the cover out and found the little metal tubbing attached to the pump with a nut was lose, I could turn that nut completely free with my fingers. So I tight it up, closed the unit and is working like it suppose. After that is working good but it was a big disappointment for me as I was expecting to receive something new and with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben J Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Mine makes a buzzing sound and does nothing else. Waited for light to turn on, pressed switch for twenty seconds, just buzzing. It does not appear to be generating any suction to pull fluid to heating coil. I am returning immediately. You can buy one from Party City at about the same price or if you are creative use some household items to drop the fluid onto a hot coil instead of buying this heat producing noise maker.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain fog machines with a remote!
customer_reviews.text: The price is great for the value of this product and it functions as said and designed, however the 2000 cfm I think is exaggerated a bit more like 1500- 1700. I have a Chauvet Hurricane 1100 and it definitely puts out more cfm than this one, but we are talking double the price too! This is a bargain worth buying if you don't need fog on command as I like to put it. This one is in a cycle unless you manually push the buttons (start and stop) before it has gone through its continuous cycle. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: coxm75

customer_reviews.title: Worked, but not good enough, or as instructions stated.
customer_reviews.text: Fog machine worked, but spit out some liquid even after twice the advised warm up period. Our unit also did not ever display the green "Ready" LED, or the "aural" sound the instructions said it would when warmed up. We tried it multiple times knowing that some items need a break-in period to function properly. We are sending it back to try another one, and give it another chance knowing that at this price quality is not going to be 100%, but hoping for 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: HJ Tex

customer_reviews.title: Fog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I got this to make the laser dance parties I throw for my kids even better. I made my own "Fog Juice" by using glycerine and distilled water - way cheaper than the commercial stuff and I know what I'm breathing in.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...then cools....does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. We used it to put out some smoke on a tribal scene. It worked as we needed it for a few seconds of smoke here and there. You will definitely not get continuous smoke! Button kept sticking so I shaved off plastic casting edges with knife to keep it from sticking. It worked for the little bit and one time I needs it. Then I sold it at a garage sale because I didn't need it. Update: Added another star for great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine once we figured it out. push button after warm up. Then push again if you want to stop. If you leave it on constant it can only go for so long then when stops and has to warm up again. when it’s ready you push button again for another cycle. That’s the best I can recall now a couple months later. Used the high performance liquid, set smoke alarm off in the house. Haha so moved to front yard for lottsa smoke.
customer_reviews.author: normajean999

customer_reviews.title: Yaaaas!!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This fog machine is awesome!! It puts out a ton of fog and the fog lingers well. It covered my pool, then it covered my front lawn and spilled into the street and I only filled the chamber once with fog juice (bought the recommended fog juice with the fog machine). Also, it has a remote!! Buy it, you will not be disappointed!! ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Choate

customer_reviews.title: Updated to 5 - from Very dissatisfied and wonder how the average reviews can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Customer service got in touch with me and instantly replaced the faulty device. 5 stars for things can go wrong and fixing them right away Original: Very dissatisfied and wonder how the average reviews can be so high on this product. I can press the button for 5 seconds making smoke and then the machine turns off and goes into what I suspect a “cooling mode”. After a minute the red light goes back on and I can press the button to make smoke for another 5 seconds. Smoke tends to come out of the front and many other places.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, works very well (so far)
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars because I've had terrible luck with previous fog machines, but that wasn't the case with this one. Ordered this at the last minute for this year's Halloween haunt. It worked very well outdoors straight out of the box, for 4 or 5 hours straight -- in spite of snow and low temperature. (Price was slightly higher than previous -- and crappy -- fog machines I've purchased, but really not that much higher.) That's my first and only time using it so far, so I don't know how it will hold up under long-term use, but I'm extremely happy with this machine and I'm going to buy a second one now for use next year.
customer_reviews.author: Illinois Tom

customer_reviews.title: Giving a second chance
customer_reviews.text: It worked once. Next time I plugged it in it would not heat up and just squirted fog juice out the front. UPDATE: The manufacturer reached out after reading my review and sent another machine. I have not had a chance to test it but was impressed with their proactive approach. I will update this review more fully once I have used the machine a few times.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS IN SCHOOLS
customer_reviews.text: Fun. But DO NOT USE THIS AT YOUR CHILD'S SCHOOL! We operated this fog machine in our home with no issues. Lots of fun for the kiddos! However, I then decided to bring the Fog Machine to the Kindergarten Halloween party. BAD IDEA!!!!!! This fog machine activated the fire alarm. Building was evacuated. Fire trucks arrived. #mommyfail!!! PLEASE, operate this device in your own home. Have fun with it, but be aware that it WILL set off sensitive (particulate/ion) fire alarms.
customer_reviews.author: A Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this fog machine and strobe lights for my birthday to surprise my wife and it was the hit of the night. Loved it so much next day ordered a gallon jug of fog fluid
customer_reviews.author: Reginold Logan

customer_reviews.title: Ok value, customer service seems good
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. The original machine I ordered was a big disappointment. It only puts out a little at a time, and had a long wait before it would create fog again. We used it for a party and since the room was small it was ok. Seems like I got a bad one. After the event was over and I no longer needed a fog machine the company sent a replacement without any notice, and a polite email asking me to take their resolution into consideration. I haven’t tested it, since Halloween has come and gone but it seems like good customer service and the new one probably works since other reviewers seemed happy.
customer_reviews.author: B fly

customer_reviews.title: Great device and used with "FogWorx Fog Juice" if you're ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We use it in our living room for karaoke parties and last time I just held down the fog button forever. The whole house became foggy for about 25 or 30 minutes. Great device and used with "FogWorx Fog Juice" if you're looking for a recommendation on the fog liquid to use.
customer_reviews.author: Doubly

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Made our halloween themed b-day party awesomely spooky. Seriously, it filled our whole giant front yard with thick creepy smoke! Everyone loved it! I set a book on the on-switch button and it went off at regular intervals. Just make sure you keep it filled with smoke-juice. I liked it so much I bought a wireless remote controlled one form a local store. It sucked. It worked about 50% of the time. Buy the hard wired one. Works so much better.
customer_reviews.author: jd williamson

customer_reviews.title: but I was disappointed with this one
customer_reviews.text: So this is my fault... but I didn't read the description closely enough to see that you actually have to hold down a button to make this work. I don't know if a fog machine exists that will just make the fog on its own, but I was disappointed with this one. I wanted it on my porch for a spooky halloween theme, but I had to sit out there with it in order for it to run.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only using ONCE, only 4 days after receiving it!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, exactly ONCE. I purchased this for a play I was directing at the school where I teach, and we were excited to have a special effect like fog on stage, but when we tried to use it at the second dress rehearsal, it didn't heat up and just spit out a thin stream of liquid instead. We followed instructions, it wasn't dropped or anything like that. I'm so angry and disappointed. There's no way we can get another one in time for our performance. I want a full refund and apology. Don't waste your money--or your hopes--on this piece of junk. It will only work once. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little unit for small-to-medium size rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little unit for small-to-medium size rooms. I haven't tried it on a larger room yet, but it may work if you're not looking for dense fog. It heats up in 1-2 minutes, and will dispense plenty of fog to fill up our living room/downstairs. I have only used the wired remote function. It can be a bit limiting, but for home use it us fine. It is probably worth spending the extra money for the wireless option, in hindsight.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a high school musical production and am very happy with its performance. The price is right and it kicks out the fog pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Great Fog Machine! Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great fog machine. We love it. I do wish that it had a button so that it could work with out the remote control. That being said, we lost our remote control and the very fast customer service department helped us be able to replace it. So I would highly reccommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: bex graham

customer_reviews.title: Lots ‘o Fog! Short remote cord.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Theefun for helping us wow the kids at our VBS this year. Really brought set design to life. I only wish the controls had a longer cord - I should have ordered the wireless. ******UPDATE******* 1 year later, the fogger overheated and stopped working. I’m about to submit a warranty claim and will update this review to let you know what their customer service is like.
customer_reviews.author: Ejoaquinh

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Received and set up in my workshop to see how it worked. Turned on, waited for warm up, and started the fog. Unit filled my 2400 sf lower level up with a heavy fog. My wife thought the house was on fire. I am very satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL STARR

customer_reviews.title: Great for small room or party
customer_reviews.text: Fast start-up for a small machine. But not enough consistent fog output or fog-staying power for use on small stage. Will be returning as it doesn’t have enough output for personal preference. Would be fine for home party or small room.
customer_reviews.author: Holly E

customer_reviews.title: ... along with Froggy's Fog Swamp juice and it was fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for Halloween along with Froggy's Fog Swamp juice and it was fantastic!!! It filled the entire downstairs of our house and even made it's way upstairs. This is an awesome fog machine and I know well probably be around to use it for many other occasions
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Menn

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this fog machine one star due to the fact that it didn’t work. However, I’m updating my original review as customer service reached out me to try and rectify the situation. Dealing with them was nice, easy and extremely hassle free. They sent me out a replacement immediately. From my experience dealing with customer service, I will gladly buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: the fog is consistent but not as thick as an older one I had it side by side with. Worked well because the old one laid the fog thick and lower and this one just filled the air. Gave a nice affect
customer_reviews.author: Waterdog

customer_reviews.title: Great service and good product
customer_reviews.text: As far as the product goes, it is a decent fog machine and it works well. It’s by no means top of the line but for the price, it is exceptional. I had ordered 2 and couldnt get either to work, the seller had emailed me updated instructions and was able to get one working but the other wouldn’t work. I contacted the seller and they expedited a replacement and said tonnot worry about sending the broken one back to maje things easier for me. I’m very inpressed with the service and will be definitely going back to this particular seller for future needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but where is the automation?
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit and is why I bought a second one, the first machine didn't come with a remote control so this is a good function however I still wonder why there are little to no machines available that are automatic?
customer_reviews.author: D. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: No fog?!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried and tried to get this to work. It got really hot but never had any fog! Really bummed! I wanted it to add to the ambiance of my first costume party! I followed the directions and used the recommended fog solution...
customer_reviews.author: KNOLAN

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on without holding button
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Halloween party to produce smoke/fog in the house on a regular basis. However, this did not occur because in order to get smoke/fog, you have to push a button every single time. There is no setting to product continuous fog.
customer_reviews.author: SamReview

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for one Halloween Season
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted one season :( Bought in 2018 - worked fine. Cleaned it per instructions. Brought it out for Halloween in 2019 -- lights go on, heats up, but pump makes no sound when remote button is pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ora72

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 15minutes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an indoor party. Did a test run the day before. Worked perfectly well 3 times. On the 4th time it shot out the liquid fog juice through the nozzle. Figured I might have caused the nozzle to cool down too much by using it 3 times in a row. Tried it again for the party and showered my guest in a stream of fog juice. Don't bother with this unit. And in case you're wondering I followed the instructions to the "t" and made sure to use professional fog juice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Farraro

customer_reviews.title: but works great after that
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to warm up, but works great after that. I need to find a timer so I don't have to man the button. Got this for Halloween and am so excited to use it! Definitely a good buy. Packaging was perfect and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: C L Gray

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine for my 11 year old daughters Halloween party, it was the main part of one of the scare features we had set up. When we got the machine we did a trial run to make sure we knew what to do. Machine took a while to be “ready” but not knowing any better we thought that was normal. The day of the party game and the machine never switched to “ready” therefore fog never worked which resulted in that scare feature not working. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my halloween party
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my halloween party. Filled the entire main floor (800 SF) with one solid press of the button. Only recommendation I would make is to have a timer on the machine you could set to burst the fog in intervals, as the user has to always go back to the remote to do so when the fog dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie’s Angel

customer_reviews.title: I’d look else where
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not good for the money. Works well with very small rooms but not much else. The fog juice bottle is loose in the housing and doesn’t close tightly, allowing it to spill everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Markwood, Chris

customer_reviews.title: Small, but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine for the price! As the description points out, it has great output. I used it for halloween on my front porch, and it covered my entire block. Front yard to back! Don't skimp on the fog juice! Quality matters. If you want the full effect, spend the extra money there.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Went to use it for the first time on Halloween and what a huge disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Went to use it for the first time on Halloween and what a huge disappointment!!!!!!! My grandson stayed with me to run the fogger and it wouldn't do anything but make a horrible noise. Tried to get a return label this evening and the returns were discontinued on this shipment as of November 3rd, 2017. Do not order from this vendor!!! I would have given it zero stars but had to give one in order to provide review.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Gave me the smoke effect i needed, i just dont like that the little hose on the top isnt water tight so i ended up spilling this all over my equipment at the end of a shoot.
customer_reviews.author: bookloverextrodinare

customer_reviews.title: Cranks out the smoke!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing blows my old machine out of the water. It's manual only, no timers or auto settings, so you have to sit there and push the button, but for smaller parties/rooms it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome, but not the worst
customer_reviews.text: The fog doesn't really travel throughout the room, it just stays in one area and kind of turns into a hazy smoke versus a fog. Not awesome, but not the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Instructions could have been a bit clearer but once I figured it out it does exactly what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chain_Choked

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this product!! It is a complete waste of money!! Unfortunately, we were only able to use the fog machine one time before it quit working. We tested the fog machine to make sure it worked and it worked great but then later on in the day for our Halloween party, we tried using it again and it just completely stopped working! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Used it last Halloween for a party, cleaned it the right way and now this year tested it and the pump is bad...
customer_reviews.author: snolingos

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This - but the customer service is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband last Christmas. He took it out last night for the first time to set up for Halloween. It worked, gave a huge blast of fog then stopped. Only goes on if you hold the button down and will do a single blast then stop. You cannot set it up and turn it on and it just goes, so only useful if you sit next to it and every five minutes hit the button, because it will not go on if you hit it then when it stops immediately hit it again. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fog machine
customer_reviews.text: This fog machine is perfect I have several friends that wants mine. I say no way
customer_reviews.author: JoneaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fog machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: This fogger is awesome. Easy to use, safe, and puts out great levels of fog. I saw one reviewer who recommended rubber banding the button but I found if you just unlock the unit via the remote control, it runs continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hewit

customer_reviews.title: Fire simulation
customer_reviews.text: We used it to fog up the area, like smoke, for fire training. Worked well but forgot about alarm system and we set off an alarm that the station was on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Fog Machine
customer_reviews.text: Searched for some time to find this one. Never owned one before so I really did not know what to expect. This product was definitely worth the money hand down. put out plenty of fog and the juice that I bought with worked very well too, worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Colucci

customer_reviews.title: This thing will fog your yard within a minute. ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing will fog your yard within a minute.. REALLY. I was worried the fire department would be called after testing it out for about 10 minutes. POWERFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Finally Halloween is coming. Tested the fog machine tonight. It took less than 1 minute for the machine ready to release fog. The smell of the fog is mild. The machine does get hot when it's working. Works pretty well. You need to hold the button on the remote controller to release the fog
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work right
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Returning - good thing I tested before the day needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great fog machine !! I would recommend this to anyone interested.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fog
customer_reviews.text: Kids had so much fun with it! It worked very well and put a lot of fog out!
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: New unit worked after rma
customer_reviews.text: Would not blow smoke, the fluid pump was dead on arrival. Cheap Chinese construction... appeared to have been repackaged and not new. EDIT: I have been sent a new unit and this one works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: SoapnWater

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Holy effing yaaaaaaaas!!! This Lil pony packs a whallup! I use it with Froggy's Swamp Juice and dayum does it work effortlessly. Quick satisfied over here!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Perrin

customer_reviews.title: worth it buy it
customer_reviews.text: this was easy to use and gave me just what i needed the smoke probably blew out the machine for 10 seconds instead on 20
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Created the perfect ambience for a "smoky" speakeasy party in my studio ...
customer_reviews.text: Created the perfect ambience for a "smoky" speakeasy party in my studio apartment. With just a push of the button, the entire room was filled with fog. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we received this and it didn't work. Don't waste your time or money on it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a show. Was not impressed. Update... I was contacted by the manufacturer and was offered a full refund for my product. I do appreciate the great customer service. I will try one more time at my show and provide an update.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with the wireless remote and it did t come with the screws for the mounting bracket. It also looked like it came pre used, sticky liquid on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hileman

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine and value for money. Used it for a party and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: BabyPuggle

customer_reviews.title: as good as far more expensive fog machines ive owned
customer_reviews.text: so this fog machine is really cheap, but outputs tons of fog really quickly and recharges quickly, 10/10 would buy again, as good as far more expensive fog machines ive owned. u cant go wrong with this fog machine
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily and spontaneously.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked twice when tested, then began squirting liquid instead of fog on the day it was meant to be used. All directions were followed, but it appears that this unit has a defective heating element.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fun fog machine
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good fog machine for the price. It’s really nice having the remote to control it so you don’t have to keep getting up and going over to the machine to turn it on. It worked out really great for my Halloween props.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on Halloween and it did not disappoint. I had it on my front porch while handing out candy. It is designed to be used indoors but worked well for me outside with little to no wind.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked well right out of the box. Great for the haunted house.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Brown

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work more than 5 minutes had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Works like it was supposed to, not a huge amount of smoke it is a little machine so don't expect to fill your whole yard full of smoke. It is portable like it says.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Fun tool for media or parties.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for photo shoots, parties and video work. Decent build quality and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorX21

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I recommend purchasing a separate fog machine timer ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I recommend purchasing a separate fog machine timer so that you do not have to manually dispense the fog. Provides almost as much fog as standing next to my boyfriend with his vape.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bland

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine when I did a practice run but when I set it up for our Halloween party it only worked for about 10 min and stopped blowing fog. It would only spit the fog juice out in liquid form not fog. My party was after the "return" date so I guess I'm just out of luck with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Fortner

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Used it last night worked great produced great fog in 30 second burst . Have to push and hold button to produce fog. Wish there was a way to keep producing without holding button....
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is great. It took FOREVER to warm up the first ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is great. It took FOREVER to warm up the first time and the light did not click on as stated but it did work. WE used it inside for a party and outside on Halloween. No frills but good price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is a top notch fogger... set off my smoke alarm multiple times on halloween.. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BStell

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: worked great, the chords were long enough for us to put the machine out side the door and the foot petter inside behind the door so we could activate it as trick or treaters arrived
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Obermeier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worked once. Think the fuse went out. Have not been able to find the right fuse for it to replace. It just spits the liquid out now.
customer_reviews.author: James Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Paired with a laser light machine
customer_reviews.text: Very good amount of fog for the size, i use it in my basement 400sqf and is more than enough
customer_reviews.author: X3MR8SR

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. It's very easy to use and setup and only takes a few minutes to warm up before use. Very pleased with this product and would highly recommend!My kids very like it
customer_reviews.author: casmo

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work right out of the box. Fog came out the side vents instead of blowing out of the front like it is supposed to. Threw it in the garbage and bought a more expensive but better quality fog machine from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Spear

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect indoors, but not really big enough for an outdoor event.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Had a party in LA. This was a nice affect. Lost it at our second party... Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fog machine for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fog machine for a great price! Remote works great but know that the fog is released in bursts every 2-3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my fault but didn’t realize you have to press ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my fault but didn’t realize you have to press and hold the button for fog to come out. Can’t really dance and hold the button at the same time. Should just diapense fog continuously. Also didn’t realize there was a return window that I missed by 2 Days. Any way I can still return?
customer_reviews.author: N. Shultz

product_meta.title: Fog Machine, Theefun 400W Smoke Machine with 2000CFM Fog, Wired and Wirelss Remote Control Fog Machine for Halloween Wedding Party and Stage Effect
product_meta.description:
Theefun Fog Machine
Features with compact streamline body structure, this 400W Theefun Fog Machine can continually produce uniform, unscented and long lasting fog, ideal for enhancing lively atmosphere of live concerts, stages, parties, Pubs, balls and family entertainment gatherings. Just hide the machine in a place there it can not be seen and then click the remote to send out a blast of fog. 
But do remember the following cautions before each use. 1.Always check whether there is enough fog fluid in the tank before each use to avoid danger.
2.Do not spray fog to people directly and get it far away from fire or other heat resources. Specifications
- Voltage: AC 110V/60Hz
- Power: 400W
- Tank Capacity: 300ml(0.079gal)
- Output: About 2000 cfm 
- Fluid Consumption: 7.5 ml/min
- Warm up Time: 3-5 min
- Output Distance: 2-3 m
- Remote Length: 3m/9.8ft
- Dimension: 23 x 11 x 11.5 cm / 9.06 x 4.33 x 4.53 in (L*W* H)
- Weight: 4 lbs Package Contents
1 x Fog Machine
1 x Remote Console
1 x Handle
2 x Screw
2 x Gasket
1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: ♥【Effective Fog Spray】: Produce uniform, unscented fog very fast after a few minutes warming up with an output of 2000 CFM((cubic feet per minute) or so and 2-3 m distance
♥【Easy to Use】: With a wired and a wireless remote, built in power cord and the visible fluid level, you can always have direct control of your fog machine
♥【Durable Aluminum Body】: Aluminum body with nice heat dissipation ability, ensures durability and long lifespan
♥【Energy Saving and Non-toxic】: Add professional fog fluid into the tank, then it can produce non-toxic fog continually via pressing the red button on wired console when you need.
♥【Widely Used】: Perfect for enhancing atmosphere of Halloween, live concerts, stages, festivals, wedding ceremonies or family entertainment gatherings. Indoor use only.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars529 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
